data.text:
ARCADE, FOOD & EXTREME FUN!

Wasilla Extreme Fun Center is the best place for Family Fun and Entertainment. We have indoor racing karts, laser tag, the newest video and arcade games, bumper cars, mini bowling, rock climbing wall, laser shooting gallery, pizza and drinks, freshly made cotton candy, party packages and more! Book your next party today or bring the family in to play!

RACING KARTS

Our state-of-the-art racing karts are all electric and all power. The whole family can enjoy an adrenaline pumping ride!

EAT & DRINK

Our menu has your favorite Pizza, Wings, and More! Top it off with something extra like an ICEE, Ice Cream Float or Dessert Pizza.

EXTREME LASER TAG

Hosting up to 24 players simultaneously, power-ups can make this laser tag so much more than just tag.

PARTIES & GROUPS

Whether you’re looking for a place for small or large parties, we have the space for you. From kid birthday parties to private parties.

MASSIVE ARCADE

With more than double the arcade games ever found in the region, play for hours and never play the same thing twice.

PLAY ALL DAY

Bumper Cars, Mini Bowling, Rock Climbing Wall, Laser Shooting Gallery, Kid's Play Zone.

Fun for everyone!

EXPLORE MORE OF THE FUN

RACING KARTS

Featuring Racing Carts with speeds that will make you want to do it over and over.

LASER TAG

Hosting up to 24 players simultaneously, power-ups can make this laser tag so much more than just tag…

MASSIVE ARCADE

With more than double the arcade games ever found in the region, play for hours and never play the same thing twice.

PARTIES

Birthdays, Field Trips, Company Events and More.

REDEMPTION CENTER

A treasure trove of incredibly awesome prizes.

BUMPER CARS

A fun time classic, Bumper Cars at the Extreme Fun Center are a great group activity.

PARTIES

Birthdays, Field Trips, Company Events and More.

XD DARK RIDE

Experience the thrill of a roller-coaster and excitement of a laser blasting game!

MINI BOWLING

An experience like none other, mini bowling at the Extreme Fun Center is great for all ages.

PIZZA

Fuel for your FUN! Pizza, ICEE and more!

Wasilla, AK 99654

Join Our Team

We’re seeking dynamic individuals to join our team. Applicants need to be able to offer excellent customer service to ensure each guest has an amazing time! If you think you’re the person for the job, look at our current job postings below.
